name: myNursebot
0:
”Alexa ask myNursebot to add a symptom”
”Alexa ask myNursebot to add a blood pressure reading”
”Alexa ask myNursebot to check medications”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my nurse bot
Developer Terms of Use
des:
**Disclamer - This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number. **

Dealing with chronic health conditions can feel like an uphill battle, with so many appointments and medications to manage. myNursebot can help lighten the load. It can help track medications (including potential drug interactions) and symptoms, visits to the doctor, and physical vitals. It emails health summary which comes handy when you see your doctor. Intended for both users and caregivers, this skill aims to simplify managing or helping someone else manage a busy personal health schedule.

Watch an Introductory video.at https://youtu.be/91evpAZj5Nc
